description:
A detective hired by Chizuko`s http://anidb.net/ch39557 [aunt] and http://anidb.net/ch39558 [uncle] to look for her when she is taken by http://anidb.net/ch11900 [Nijuu-Mensou], chosen specifically because Chiko`s aunt knew that he would be too incompetent to find http://anidb.net/ch11899 [Chiko]. He travels around on the money they give him and makes up reports that he is getting closer to finding her, though is aware that Chiko`s aunt does not care if Chiko is found or not.
Source: Wiki
name: Akine Daisaku
